        public static boolean isDuringOfficeHours​(java.lang.String start,
                                          java.lang.String end)
        Parameters:
        start - start date and time of the appointment
        end - end date and time of the appointment
        Returns:
        Returns true is the appointment's start and end time fall within the office hours.

                                                         java.lang.String apptID)
        Parameters:
        customerID -
        startDate -
        endDate -
        Returns:
        Returns true if the customer has another appointment that has overlapping time with the one being passed in.

      • removeColonFromTime

        public static int removeColonFromTime​(java.lang.String time)
        Parameters:
        time - string representing the time portion of the date time.
        Returns:
        Returns an int representing the time portion of the date string with the colon removed, so that mathematical operations and be performed upon it.
